title: SLRR by Birger BASIC Street legal www.slrr-sweden.nu
description:
....::::SLRR by Birger BASIC::::....
   <a href=" http://www.slrr-sweden.nu" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.slrr-sweden.nu</a>
Swedish Street Legal modding forum

A very stable basic modpack for you guys who just want to add cars
and some parts by yourself.
------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INCLUDING]
221mwm based game
No double items in catalog!
SIMcade 0.8 included (better handling)
Now you make money on buying trashed cars, repairing them and selling them
Paintmod by BB93
SweetFX graphics (activate/deactivate with scroll lock)
Better music, all original is gone
No intro videos
Choose from visible driver or invisible driver
JAGS, Francos and CMS rims + tires
CMS brakes
New mufflers
MR sirs suspension
DS headcovers for i4 engine
Nightriders enginesounds
Highres sky
New racetracks
Dealers and city are working

No new cars in this pack. Add them yourself. Game is based on 221mwm
so no 2.3.0 cars will work unless you add le2mwm mod
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[New cheats]

    timemachine - a day of ROC
    fastpromotion - get you to next team
    ilikecheating - enable cheat keys

[Keyboard]
Keys are active only on tracks!

1 - Time speed down
2 - Time speed up
3 - Time PauseUnpause
4 - Rotate camera mode
0 - Mirror (it's very early alpha)

TAB - ShowHide OSD
B - Look back
M - ShowHide Map

Numpad 0-9 - Pneumatic suspension

F9 - Free Camera
PgUp, PgDn, Numpad-, Numpad+ - Free camera control

[CHEAT KEYS]
F6 - Manual repairpaint Car
F10 - Repair, tank nitroflip car
F11 - Get new car (you carrier car will be teleport to the carlot
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[Rivals]
Some tracks require one or more saved cars to work as intended.

Here's how to do your own!

Drag Track:
You need to create a car and save it as DragCar for this track to work. 
The saved car will be used by the computer AI. 

Coast:
If you want to race against Rivals (optional thanks to the selector). 
You need to save cars with names Coast, Coast1, Coast2 etc.

Akagi track:
If you want to race with a rival, save a car named AkagiCar 

Nevada Freestyle dift track:
If you want to race with other cars. Create and save cars as nevabot1, nevabot2 etc.

Top gear test track:
Save a car as STIG if you want to choose the opponent car. 
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[SLRR Editor]
If you want to use a certain engine in a car that is not supported by default, you can use SLRR editor!
It is included in the Street legal dir. U need .NET framework 2.0 or higher to run it.
Fire it up, choose the street legal exe and start experimenting on your own risk!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ENGINE SCRIPT]
IF the engine doesn't fit the cars engine bay, wich is quite often unfortunately. 
You can use a little trick i included. Select the screwdriver (fine tuning tool) and click 
on the engines oilpan. That lets you adjust the placement of the engine!
